summary: The 'Save our Safety-Net Hospitals Act of 2025' amends Title XIX of the Social Security Act to modify limitations on disproportionate share hospital (DSH) payment adjustments under the Medicaid program. It clarifies which costs of services are considered for DSH payments, addressing payments made under Title XVIII and applicable plans.  The bill also allows states, under certain conditions, to distribute unspent DSH allotments retroactively. This includes provisions for retroactive modification of State plans and reporting requirements.
